text: whoa this is Bill Cunningham from New

throughout the country up till the end

windows were a highlight of the holiday

been putting them down because so many

think people have been doing at office

40 motorcyclists roaring down fifth

York like London in Paris is a walking
City they just don't think Oh a jump in

the magic of the season is all there
everything is there if you take the time
to look so enjoy and happy holidays
